title: Game crashes and I get 6 minute queue?
body:
Pro... real pro... I bet if it were ranked I'd lose LP too.

Hire a coder that's good for once.

replies.body: If you can be a bit more specific with what happened, I can provide some steps you can take in order to prevent this from happening again. Any specific error message you saw or a specific behavior around the crash?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=OYpu7FBm,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-02T20:54:27.149+0000)
>
> If you can be a bit more specific with what happened, I can provide some steps you can take in order to prevent this from happening again. Any specific error message you saw or a specific behavior around the crash?

Nada, lil pop up said "league of legends has crashed" and poof... no idea what else to say.
Did this happen inside a match, in champ select, or just idling sitting in the client waiting for a queue to pop?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=OYpu7FBm,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-03T15:12:26.831+0000)
>
> Did this happen inside a match, in champ select, or just idling sitting in the client waiting for a queue to pop?

Champ Select, pop up said that and client closed.

Thanks for clarifying. In that case, it sounds like your client is dropping its connection to the game platform service. This is often the result of network settings that prevent a good link from being established, so I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step.

Let me know if those changes resolved your issue.

What kind of trundle do you take me for?

My connections solid.
Ah, so the steps inside that guide didn't cause any noticeable change in resolving this problem?

None.

In that case, we'll need to escalate this to our tech team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can investigate further. I recommend running a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) then attaching them to your ticket.

Let me know if you have any questions.
And now a "Error, failed to join queue". Kept queueing and it worked...

LolClient.exe has stopped working

A problem caused the program to stop working correctly.
Windows will close the program and notify you if a solution is available.

That's what it is... it did it again.
